Name: NumberRange
Description: Defines the valid number range or number values for the representation.

Name: NumericTypeCode
Description: Identification of the numeric type such as integer, decimal, etc. supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary. The DDI Alliance has provided a controlled vocabulary (NumericType) to support this element at http://www.ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies.

Name: Format
Description: A format for number expressed as a string.

Name: Scale
Description: The scale of the number expressed as an integer (for example a number expressed in 100's, 5 = 500 would have a scale of 100).

Name: DecimalPositions
Description: The number of decimal positions expressed as an integer (precision of the number).

Name: Interval_IntervalType
Description: The interval between valid responses expressed as an integer.

Name: Accuracy
Description: The level to which a number is considered to be accurate. Expressed as a decimal.
